title: Can we please get additional discounts on something other than skins in the next 'Your Shop'?
body:
I've already had a long discussion with a support guy and we both came to the agreement that having discounts on something like chromas would be a good addition to 'Your Shop' the next time it comes around.

I am a collector and my 'Your Shop' is just empty - which is a pretty big bummer. I'm pretty sure I speak for all of the other collectors aswell when I say that having chromas in our 'Your Shop' would be a major improvement and a nice touch for those of us who own all skins and would otherwise get kinda punished for spending a lot of money on this game.

Even though this time around I missed out on a good deal because there was no alternative planned for those who own all skins, I hope that there will be something for us the next time around.
